text: Mendoza dersuuzalai is a jumping spider species in the genus Mendoza that lives in Russia. It was first described in 1992. The species was originally allocated to the genus Marpissa, but was transferred to Mendoza in 1999. ==References== Category:Salticidae Category:Spiders of Russia Category:Spiders described in 1992 Category:Taxa named by Wanda Wesołowska
title: Mendoza dersuuzalai
